name: Death on Barovus — Resurrection and Replacement

text.content:
CAMPAIGN RULES — DEATH AND RESURRECTION

The Warp Reclamation: Souls that die on Barovus are caught in the warp rift and recycled. Characters return after 1d10 rounds at 1 Wound, prone, Stunned 1 round.

Resurrection Costs:

1st Death: 1d10 CP + 1d10 IP. Killing weapon destroyed.

2nd Death: 2d10 CP + 2d10 IP. All gear lost. Minor Mutation.

3rd Death: 3d10 CP + 3d10 IP. All gear lost. Major Mutation. -1d5 random Characteristic.

4th+ Death: Permanent. Soul claimed by Slaanesh.

Strahd Knows: He comments on each resurrection through servitor-skulls, notes, or personal visits.

Replacement Acolytes: Cell Sigma-Raven-IX-Beta. Max 2 replacements. Starting equipment only. 1d10 CP + 1d5 IP on arrival.

name: Resupply and Survival — The Logistics of Damnation

text.content:
CAMPAIGN RULES — RESUPPLY SYSTEM

Tier 1 — Vostra Trade: Commerce tests with relationship modifiers. Standard inventory available (rations, ammo, medical, basic gear). Track Vostra standing: Hostile → Suspicious → Neutral → Friendly → Allied.

Tier 2 — Scavenging & Crafting: Battlefield salvage (Awareness/Search tests by quality tier). Location-specific salvage. Ammo reloading via Trade (Armourer) — success: 2d10 rounds/hour, failure: unreliable (10% jam rate).

Tier 3 — Faction Rewards: Recaf Distillery (rations, blessed recaf), Van Richten (blessed ammo, intel), Silver Drakes (sacred oils), Vallak Armory (standard military), Krezk/Abaron (cybernetics, medical — at CP cost), Vostra/Eva (trade discounts, safe travel).

Tier 4 — Strahd's Gifts: Genuine supplies at 1 CP moral compromise cost. WP test or rationalize (-10 WP vs Domination for 1d5 days). After 3+ gifts: escalating conditions attached.

Cybernetics Maintenance: 30-day cycle. Days 31-45: minor malfunctions. Days 46-60: -10 penalty. Days 61+: total failure. Options: Abaron (1d5 CP), Field Repair (Hard -20 Tech-Use), Scavenged Parts (Very Hard -30).
